numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I notice that the NFL has the 3rd highest percentage of athletes of color.
3. I notice that the NFL has the lowest percentage of coaches of color.
4. This situation contrasts with the MLS.
5. In the MLS, 60% of players are of color.
6. In the MLS, 41% of coaches are of color.
7. 41% is the highest percentage of coaches of color among all American major league sports.
8. I wonder what history has to do with this situation.
9. I ask whether the history of a sport affects the percentage of players of color.
10. I ask whether the history of a sport affects the percentage of coaches of color.
11. I ask whether there is no relationship between history and these percentages.
12. I ask why the MLS has the best ratio of players of color to coaches of color.
13. Sports is a popular pastime in America.
14. Millions of people attend games in the stands.
15. Millions of people watch games on television.
16. The current situation makes watching on television more likely than watching in the stands.
17. The graphs show the history of America.
18. The graphs show inequality between people of color and people who are not of color.
19. America's history is hidden within our favorite sports.
